moves.1. e4: Black loses the queen early and then gets slaughtered.
moves.1... e5 2. f4 exf4 3. Bc4 Qh4+: Risky if you are not careful...
moves.7. Bxf7+: Of course! Now white has an advantage. Black can't take due to the fork, can't castle and is under attack.
moves.12... Kf6 13. Nd5+: Now the king is trapped in the center
moves.13... Ke6 14. Qg4+: Brings the Q into the attack .
moves.14... Kd6 15. Nf7+: Wins material and forces K to bad square.
moves.15... Kc6 16. c3: Prevents the K from getting out of fire with plans of mopping up
moves.19... Kd6: ? Best was Kb5, which hangs on.
moves.21. Bxe5#: Mate in the center. A real slaughter!
